original_text: He does not lend money to someone and then ask to receive more money back. He refuses to do anything that is wrong. He helps people in a way that is right and fair.
korean_text: 변리를 위하여 꾸어 주지 아니하며 이자를 받지 아니하며 스스로 손을 금하여 죄를 짓지 아니하며 사람과 사람 사이에 진실하게 판단하며

sentences.original_text: He does not lend money to someone
and then ask to receive more money back
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 더 많은 돈을 받기를 요구하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: He refuses to do anything that is wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 잘못된 어떤 일도 하기를 거부합니다

sentences.original_text: He helps people in a way that is right
